attributes.action: Bring forth legislation annulling election results of any elected representative whose campaign is illegally funded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before the next election, the Govt should introduce firm legislation requiring that all local, national  and regional representatives of the people should not be able to retain their seat where it is judged that the election campaign that brought them to power broke any relevant UK legislation or regulation. 

In such circumstances, the representative returned has illegally obtained an advantage over unsuccessfull candidates whose campaigns are legally funded.

The seat should be contested by by-election at the soonest opportunity, with all candidates free to contest the election.
